name: Web
tagline: social media content for small businesses
body:
# Electrify Your Brand on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn

Social media is a vital component of your marketing strategy, regardless of your industry or the size your business. A strong online presence builds customer loyalty, establishes your authority, and generates sales.

But maintaining an engaging social media presence is a time-consuming task. In today’s fast-moving marketplace, you simply don’t have the time or resources to manage it yourself.

## That’s where Social Media Team can help.

We’re a close-knit team of Melbourne-based social media strategists, programmers, graphic designers and online marketing experts. And we’ve been creating, publishing and promoting compelling online content on behalf of our delighted clients since 2010.

## Our social media campaigns are so successful because we put your audience first, every time.

For each client, we build a unique and cohesive portfolio of graphical and text-based content, designed to resonate with your target demographic, and draw them irresistibly into your brand narrative. All for a fraction of the cost of hiring dedicated social media staff.

And every client gains complementary access to our powerful social media control panel. This streamlined dashboard lets you discover engaging content, schedule posts in advance, and post to multiple platforms through a single intuitive interface. It also enables you to easily create high-impact image posts – even if you have no previous graphic design experience.

So give yourself an edge over your competitors. Let Social Media Team take care of your online marketing activities, so you can focus on growing your business.

# We Offer Three Cost-Effective Packages

### Single Platform
Our entry-level package. Choose one platform from Facebook, Twitter or LinkedIn.
Call us for a free consultation to help decide which option best suits your business. 

### Dual Platform
Our most popular package. Choose any two platforms from Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn.
Call us for a free consultation to help decide which platforms best suit your business.

### Triple Platform
For organisations that are serious about building a powerful social media presence.
Invigorate and energise your brand across all three major platforms – Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn – with our top-of-the-range package.


All Packages Feature the Following Awesome Benefits

•	Professional content scheduled in advance and posted automatically
•	You can choose the days on which you’d like your posts to be published
•	Our social media dashboard lets you review posts and schedule extra content
•	Detailed reports identify your most popular content and the best time to post
•	Our Facebook package includes two daily text posts and three weekly image posts
•	Our Twitter package includes three daily text tweets and three weekly image tweets
•	Our LinkedIn package includes two daily updates

Call us now for a free no-obligation consultation to help decide which package is best for you.

And in the meantime, simply enter your email address in the box below to join our mailing list, and enjoy complementary access to our popular social media dashboard, so you can try before you buy.
